website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want an improved version of the iPad Air without paying Pro prices.
pros: An upgraded model from the iPad Air with a slimmer design and three color options
Its iSight camera takes exceptional photos
cons: Slightly more costly than the original iPad Air (but still a good deal if you like the model and the upgrades)

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use and setting up.
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is absolutely brilliant. Setting up could not be easier, assuming that you already have a device with iOS 11 as an operating system and you have iCloud storage, it is simply a case of aligning your iPhone camera with the moving Q ? Code that appears on the new iPad and away it goes. All data etc. Is downloaded onto the new device. This takes a relatively short time, depending on the number Apps etc. that you have, and takes much less time than the old manual method.
customer_reviews.author: G.R.Norris

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product highly reccomend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as replacement for my old ipad on the strength of a very detailed review posted by Craig Laws It is perfect and exactly what I need. I am so grateful for the post which helped me to decide.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Green

customer_reviews.title: New 2019 iPad Air is superb
customer_reviews.text: Super fast compared to the older iPad it replaced. It has retained all of the good features of the original iPad including the Home button and earphone jack but has much better battery life. Easy to set up thanks to iCloud. I was going to buy an iPad Pro but glad I instead went for the new iPad Air.
customer_reviews.author: John Millar

customer_reviews.title: Best budget tablet!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, after a terrible experience with the Samsung S5e, I ordered what I should have ordered in the first place. Non reflective display, no light bleed, awesome ecosystem, regular updates, that’s what Apple offers; you want everything but that, choose every other company. So far so good, big difference compared to the Samsung! The only minus would be the sound, the 4 speakers on the Samsung tab S5e are better than the iPad Air’s speakers, other than that, everything is an upgrade. All in all, a great tablet at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Caesar

customer_reviews.title: I love it !
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god I am in love with this it is so much better than my old iPad 2 they really have updated it I have been on pages which is sort of an office program and I have been having such fun with that. Normally I have to do those things on my laptop but I purchased a keyboard with it which makes it so much better. I love it .
customer_reviews.author: Hazel

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it’s useful for me personally, would recommend a screen protector and a case,
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: This is my first tablet bought. Every penny spent has not gone to waste.
customer_reviews.author: george

customer_reviews.title: So happy.
customer_reviews.text: I love this Ipad. I'm autistic and am not exactly great with technology but this was SO easy to set up and use, and when i had no idea what to do...i just asked Siri. Found a good range of apps for not only fun and games but to help me manage my anxiety, so this Ipad is a good tool for me, for managing my mental health. The graphics are exquisite. And everything happens so quickly and efficitently. Love the fingerprint scanner too. Really helpful when i can't usually remember passcodes to unlock. Would definitely recommend this Ipad.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Fast and light in weight
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my generation 2 IPad.IPad was up and running in 30 mins. The two many differences was speed (Nissan micro to Porsche 911) and it is very light - very useful when used for long periods
customer_reviews.author: keithferguson

customer_reviews.title: Black screen in just 4 month used Ipad, no idea what to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought it 4-5 months ago and using it for 1-2 hours in a day, yesterday evening all of sudden black screen started to appear, I tried restarting and charging but it is not turning up. online search shows it is due to hardware issue. not sure what to do, very bad quality from most iconic brand. Not sure how issue will be resolved, upset as it seems money is lost.
customer_reviews.author: Divyesh Shah

customer_reviews.title: Dead ipad
customer_reviews.text: This went dead halfway through set up and I asked for return and replacement. Repairers were not able to repair it and Apple tried 3 times to return it to factory settings. Now I have an Ipad which is dead has never been used and nowhere on the Amazon site can I find how to return it for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Griffiths

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my new iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: My iPad mini was getting really slow and also running out of memory so I decided to upgrade to this iPad Air and wow is it fast and also the screen is really good! Way better then my iPad mini screen, the display is really sharp, crisp and also the colours are very rich and vibrant. It also has lots of memory so I won’t have to worry about running out of space very soon. This iPad is really thin and light and also the battery lasts a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air: Incredibly fast, perfect sized tablet
customer_reviews.text: The iPad Air is an Incredible tablet for all apps and games. It has the A12 chip which is one of apples fastest currently and I would urge anyone tempted to buy the new iPad to think again as that has a 3 generation old A10 chip and thus will not last.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Good product as normal from Apple
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 78 year old husband to replace an IPad that I purchased him some 10 years ago, that still works, but would not update from version 9. Something, to 13. Something, which I needed to download some things. He downloads his newspaper every day to read, which is especially good when we are on holiday abroad. The new one is obviously much better and quicker to download, the only thing he has trouble with is there is no button to lock the screen either landscape or portrait, which he find annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Best tablet on the market
customer_reviews.text: Apple definitely make the best tablets, and the IPad Air 3 is definitely the best in the standard IPad range (IPad, IPad Mini, and IPad Air). The only better alternative would be the IPad Pro, which costs a lot more as serves a different purpose, to compete with Laptops and computers. The IPad Air is the best tablet on today’s market. It has a luxurious design, great battery life, brilliant size screen, etc. Might be a bit on the pricey side, but it’s definitely worth the extra money for the bigger screen, faster processor and lightweight design.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: This iPad Air bought Amazon November 2019 has never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, I thought off amazon uk but no, it came from Amazon Europe. It was a replacement for my old iPad from which I write this. It has NEVER worked. I have spent hours and hours trying. It demands 6 figure code which I've not been given then disables and tells me to press a nonexistent Home key. Is it riddled with software faults?! Is there a solution?!
customer_reviews.author: Yo Sushi

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the ipad Air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for husband's birthday to replace his old ipad which was on the blink. Very pleased with how slim, light and neat this ipad Air is compared to his old ipad - it makes the old one look very clunky. We think its a bit zippier too. I would say it is about as slim as my ipad mini.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E. J. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 4 months, sent it off to be repaired by the Amazon 3rd party repair company. Heard nothing after 2 months so chased it up, they just sent it back saying there was nothing they could do!!!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Veall

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Had an iPad 3 for 8 years which became damaged and soooo out of date. This iPad Air is brilliant, so light in comparison, loads of new features, fast, no compatibility issues and easy to setup, just placed my iPhone 7 next to it and it did the rest from my iCloud backup. Everything set up in less than half an hour, including the same open tabs in safari....brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: C. John

customer_reviews.title: Nice bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded as my old one was on its last legs. Still getting used to it
customer_reviews.author: Mandy J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid-range iPad
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tablet for all general uses. The photo handling and picture quality display is particularly good and provides the easiest way to store and view photos and videos. Bluetooth linking to an iPhone is also impressive. I upgraded to this iPad from an old iPad and found the procedure straightforward using iCloud backup. I also like the speed of operation and overall display quality. The iPad uses the new lightning connector which meant the photo card reader that I used with my old iPad needed to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Ive been wanting an iPad for a long time. I debated getting a MacBook or an iPad with a keypad and chose this. Really glad I did. It’s super quick and I haven’t even dented the memory. My son has been using it to watch films he downloaded. Everything downloads very quick and I am considering getting one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: SJD

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: this is just right for me I had a ipad air 2 and the battery charge only lasted for about an hour and sometimes it didn't charge properly so had to replace it and got this one and I love it, I think it is well worth the cost and there is not any thing that is not good about the ipad air I love the way it performs and it is so easy to use and it was so easy to set up and transfer all the stuff from the old one to the new one, so worth the 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: c. pollock

customer_reviews.title: Ipad Air 2019
customer_reviews.text: I have a quite few apple products, and the Ipad Air 3rd gen is probably the best of all of them. I paid extra for the air 3 over the standard ipad for the better quality, laminated screen with wide colour and touch tone and the display honestly is stunning. Very smooth and snappy with the powerful 6 core A12 chip. Gestures with ipad OS feel very fluid and natural. As a prime member i can now access content on kindle for free e.g marvel comics and novels for which there is a good selection. Now with the current lockdowns due covid 19 i have something to pass the time with!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a new iPad for ages so when our holiday had to be cancelled I used the money for a new iPad. I love it, the screen size is a little bigger than my last iPad Air, and it just works so much better, battery life is good and charging takes no time. So happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Starbug65

customer_reviews.title: It just keeps getting better
customer_reviews.text: This iPad is fast - the battery life is amazing. It is easy to use. If you can afford that little bit extra get one as you will not be disappointed. Leaps and bounds better than the teat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: We are on our second Air now. The first one had touchscreen issues out of the box. This one has started with the same problems, where the touchscreen doesn't work randomly. Apparently this has affected previous models of the air and still isn’t fixed. Without the problem it would be a five star review but it still wouldn’t be worth the extra over a normal iPad.
customer_reviews.author: D Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Screen and sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Samsung tablet ..but dissapointed with the sound only being stereo and the screen size . Being not wide enough. it's more of a square screen which I dont like .. my Samsung is a much better tablet.. .. I was hoping for better.
customer_reviews.author: willy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for drawing, which has been fantastic so far. Really love it. Sound quality is great for watching videos, it loads quick. Never had issues using facetime or video calling either. I never agreed with Apple's pricing, they are really expensive especially when adding the cost of a pen, case and screen protector on top. I found it difficult to find a case that i like and that works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great iPad
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased to receive my new iPod Air, brilliant pad, sad that I never received the iPad pencil that was supposed to be included. I do worry about receiving items that have something missing in them, but altogether a lovely machine. As a Prime customer, I hope that the missing parts thing that has been going on will stop once we are through this pandemic.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Janet V. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Fab!
customer_reviews.text: Love Apple and Ipad and ‘needed’ this air one,works great and seemless transition from old one
customer_reviews.author: Eurovision Fan/Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great for work and leisure
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time for leisure and work. Watch Netflix, read books on Kindle app and am learning a language online using it. Great for audio also. Battery life seems average.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This iPad has been problematic since I had it. It becomes very hot. I contacted the support services (not easy to do) who suggested that perhaps an app had not downloaded properly, thus causing the heat, and to take it back to basics then download my apps anew. It still overheats, but not as much as before, and less often. I don’t feel confident with it. I’ve been happy with two previous iPads, but am disappointed with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JennyH

customer_reviews.title: First one for me
customer_reviews.text: This is the first iPad that I have owned after years of android tablets and although I love android iOS is something else at this screen size and the app quality in the apple tablet eco system are much better than the android alternative, I also have to say that the battery life is brilliant lasting for 2 days of moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan 'Natedog'

customer_reviews.title: Continued Apple integration and quality
customer_reviews.text: I’m an Apple fan and love the integration that comes with all their devices. The iPad is no exception, excellent screen, battery is good and as always it gets better with every new generation of iPad and the camera front and rear makes video conferencing calls a doddle. I would recommend .
customer_reviews.author: MDK

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: My Ipad air is arrived today. It was great product ever!! The battery was 90% when I fisrt opened it. I do recommended this shop.
customer_reviews.author: Nanniiz4

customer_reviews.title: iPad Air 10.5
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for my iPad which ran out of space,this has so much more space I’m still in the habit of deleting items thinking I might run out of space ,I just 😍 Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Finally caved and decided to update my ipad.. I've been using an IPAD2 since I can remember, i'm a digital artist and i've been relying on company tech to do my work. but wanted to start doing my own thing on the side and finally saved up for one. great choice, easy to work and good for art.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older model with a cracked screen, the functions are simple to use...possibly because we had one previously. This one is less than half the thickness and easily half the weight. So far no issues, Ipad was bought christmas 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Continuing in the Apple ethos, another quality tablet
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat them really. Had a few apple products and when looked after the quality shows. Still have first iPad Air and battery on that is still top notch. Let’s hope this one is the same. Still built well and screen is bright. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: Simon C

customer_reviews.title: Apple keeping consistent standards high
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tablet with high quality software running on it, arrived in fantastic condition despite buying as used. Wouldn't be able to tell the difference aside from the box. Very good price for the item including accessories etc.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous - Worthy Of Praise And Adoration
customer_reviews.text: I dislike everything about Apple! I detest all things iOS! But this Apple iPad Air 3 is a thing of beauty and perfection! Smooth as butter and slides along like a warm breeze on cold skin! I am a digital artist and made the jump to iOS for the creative opportunities on the iPad and I am very impressed. Combined with the Logitech Combo Touch keyboard the iPad Air 3 is (almost) a laptop replacement. Fabulous product, worthy of praise and adoration.
customer_reviews.author: Abdin66

customer_reviews.title: Best upgrade ever
customer_reviews.text: My old iPad kept telling me it had no memory, everything was uploaded to iCloud but unable to download ... this new huge memory iPad is brilliant. Plenty of memory, everything transferred easily (except music, but a quick visit to iTunes on the laptop sorted that out).
customer_reviews.author: Snowdrop

customer_reviews.title: As good as ever..
customer_reviews.text: This is my third iPad and the slightly bigger screen and vastly increased memory has certainly made a difference. Also interest free payment by instalments over 6 months was a real bonus. As usual it’s great Apple design and functionality. Highly recommended 😎
customer_reviews.author: M. P. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bit of kit. My 2nd iPad. My other is a 3rd gen iPad. This knocks the socks off the older one. Very fast and love the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin. Excellent value for money when compared against the competitors.
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a Surface Go 2 and after 1 week returned it and bought this. There is really no argument, Apple still makes the best tablets on the market. There is discussion in the tech community that Microsoft are challenging but it all rubbish. Apples tablets are sleek and basic but they do the right things to perfection. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Nice Items
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering if to buy the air or the pro and after looking at some youtube and online review I went for the Ipad air. I manly need as second screen for my MacBook, the iPad is really light and nice to keep in hands and use. is fast and battery so far is good.
customer_reviews.author: Moustafa Mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: It’s better than I thought and as I bought it on Black Friday a great price. I do feel like I got a lot of iPad for my money. I also read some previous reviews that helped a lot when making the decision to purchase. Thank you to the people who find the time to do this. You have my respect.
customer_reviews.author: Mhutch

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Sorry can’t leave photo, as I don’t know how! The iPad has everything I need and much more. You can’t go wrong buying this, it will enhance your days and evenings. Love doing research on mine. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: richard jones

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great screen
customer_reviews.text: My old I pad had brilliantly over the years but it was time fir a new one so I bought this one and I’m really pleased with it. It’s quick the screen is clear and more importantly it has a bigger memory
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Vast improvement over my old tablet which is now 8 years old. Easy to set up from your phone if it is up to date. Still waiting for the cover ordered with it which seams to be lost in transit, so I am being very careful not to drop it in the meantime
customer_reviews.author: Mando46

customer_reviews.title: USB cannot be used to transfer files.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup from start to finish with no problems. Very disappointed that I cannot connect a usb memory stick, I get a message saying that it needs more power to operate with usb even when using the Lightning to USB 3 Camera Adapter which is what I was told I needed to use this system to transfer files.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Brant

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Was the best price we could find it (ignoring those electronics websites, with impossibly low prices, that get awful reviews). My son is over the moon with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Dafter than usual

customer_reviews.title: Good quality I pad
customer_reviews.text: Lighter in weight than my first I pad air... got wi fit on this one and seems quicker... I will always recommend an apple I pad as they are easy to use and really pleased with it..
customer_reviews.author: wiggitts

customer_reviews.title: Digital design wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot fault it, smooth, sleek and fit for my purpose of digital design. I've had Apple phones and iPods in the past but never the iPad I'm very happy with my purchase. I was skeptical with paying so much but I love it! Great investment!
customer_reviews.author: miss me

customer_reviews.title: ipad air
customer_reviews.text: I bought to replace my old ipad,I miss the screen lock option and prefered the single switch volume control to the two switch update.The battery lasts longer then the old one
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my existing very old iPad, Much faster and very easy to set up and use being an existing Apple user. With tablets you do get what you pay for, so pay up and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Phil the Wiz

customer_reviews.title: Fast with amazing screen.
customer_reviews.text: As an upgrade from iPad Air 2 this is much faster. The screen is great and noticeably larger. It takes a long time to charge and battery life isn’t as much longer than my old 5 year old iPad as I was expecting. It still can’t replace a laptop though.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant iPad daughter loves it.A big thank you to amazon for delivering this the next day,as i tried to repair a broken screen on old iPad and completely broke it.
customer_reviews.author: Chiefy

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace my iPad that was four years old. Impressed so far. Wanted better storage for my photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: ipad air - light but strong!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second ipad, nothing wrong with the first one, but was limited by being only 32 bit. This new ipad air is better still - much lighter and with higher capacity. So far, battery seems strong and processing is quick!
customer_reviews.author: CPH

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: So much better than my old iPad. It is nice and slim and as with all Apple, easy to set up. Bought it on Which? recommendation and very glad I did. Does exactly what it is meant to.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best tablet available.
customer_reviews.text: Truly awesome tablet but without the ridiculous cost of the Pro model. Fast, great screen and lightweight iris also robust to being dropped from low heights.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Love this, got a larger model because of my eyesight and this is great, no problems transferring data from my phone either, really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cully8

customer_reviews.title: It does what I want.
customer_reviews.text: I use my iPad all the time so battery life is always going to be an issue. I have only ever used Apple products and it does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great tablet
customer_reviews.text: Great iPad was pondering buying the pro but for what I need the air does the job perfectly lovely Retina display great battery life unlike my Samsung tab s6 love it
customer_reviews.author: Andrew smith

customer_reviews.title: Big machine in.
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for an old iPad. Love the iPad so easy to use and convenient to carry around. Does all I need from a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Chuckles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I have had an iPad for years but I needed to upgrade to iPad Air 3. The new iPad is slightly larger but easy to use and very clear screen.
customer_reviews.author: Funtime Davy

customer_reviews.title: Good upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Just like using my old iPad. Don’t like the price but hey ho y only get what you pay for and, for me, iPad is the best overall tablet for work, books and games.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Brown

customer_reviews.title: Lovely
customer_reviews.text: This ipad is amazing. It cams in a new box with charger and Cabel usb . Is very nice . I love it. The size is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Bianca N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect iPad to take away with you.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the size and weight of this iPad in comparison with my old one. Lovely size to watch games and tv programs on. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Mini Mo

customer_reviews.title: Can be taken anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Another addition to our communication family, easy to use, the battery life is quite outstanding and the screen is great quality
customer_reviews.author: BAZ

customer_reviews.title: Apple iPad Air
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product from Apple. Quite lightweight for size with good size screen. Does everything I want and very reliable with Apple security.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Quality
customer_reviews.text: The screen quality is fantastic and expecting this to serve me well for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice with larger screen
customer_reviews.text: Lovely and clear and the slightly larger screen makes a big difference when your eyesight is not what it used to be.
customer_reviews.author: geecee

customer_reviews.title: Ipad
customer_reviews.text: I cannot answer the battery life because I have to see if it is any better than the previous iPad battery which only lasted for about 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Graeme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing iPad, functions as a laptop and Kindle
customer_reviews.text: The iPad is amazing. I wanted to try something different from a laptop so I decided to give the iPad a go. The iPad along with the keyboard case acts like a laptop and tablet on the go. I love using the iPad as a kindle, reading books which will benefit me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruhel Miah

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this new iPad Air. It is light, with great functionality and is very fast. Excellent
customer_reviews.author: Dale Walters

customer_reviews.title: iPad new
customer_reviews.text: New updated iPad .love the new screen size.faster than my AirPad which is about 4 years old ,love it
customer_reviews.author: bobb

customer_reviews.title: Great memory
customer_reviews.text: I needed an ipad with more memory, this is fantastic, very easy to start up for first time. Love it
customer_reviews.author: twinkle64

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Watch the prices
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Good for older folk for pic quality and saving electricity because of long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Sack

customer_reviews.title: very good ipad
customer_reviews.text: great product just wish the app store was clearer in telling me the sales or the best games to buy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start again
customer_reviews.text: A replacement for my previous iPad Air which at only 3 years old died and could not be resuscitated! Hoping that this new model will do better.....Easy to set up, all the stuff from the old machine was transferred automatically. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Marion L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s great, set up is easy.its like my old iPad, but faster (faster than my current pc), with a better, clearer,bigger screen. easy to use. No cons so far.
customer_reviews.author: Grimmy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value only to be expected from Apple.
customer_reviews.text: What you expect from Apple, excellent piece of kit, well made performs first class very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lodi cowboy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My second iPad so I knew what I was getting. This is the one, no question. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: 49er

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of kit,but had a few difficulties in setting it up, apple don’t seem to use terms for complete iPad novices
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: Very good tablet...apart from poor camera.
customer_reviews.text: A quality product as expected...the camera is very average though with no flash either, other than that very good, if a little pricey .
customer_reviews.author: ian morris

customer_reviews.title: Great value and brilliant for students/commuters
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. I can do everything an iPad Pro can on this for hundreds less. It’s lightweight, great battery life, gorgeous display, and enjoyable to use on the go. I’m a student and it fulfilled all my needs, from media consumption to note taking.
customer_reviews.author: Hasaam Chaudhary

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this iPad it’s quick easy to use battery life is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Lynette mullen

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement on old one
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for an ancient model so wonderful. Slim, light weight and fast.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded and updated
customer_reviews.text: Really has been upgraded and updated as battery lasts longer and is quicker to charge
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: We’ve always had iPads and this recent purchase was the 5th we have bought
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my son’s 7 year old iPad and he is delighted by it. He is impressed with the picture quality and speed and is delighted with the overall product.
customer_reviews.author: iclaco

customer_reviews.title: Works as you would expect
customer_reviews.text: Its an iPad. So the performance and usability are good, but at a price.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Floyd

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I have not had it long. I’m getting used to it. Lovely screen colour.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Y L Parmentier

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Really like it easy to use. got this one to replace one i have that’s getting old
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: I Pad
customer_reviews.text: good quick pad easy to set up fro previous machine quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: iPad air
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new iPad so I went for iPad Air well worth it I love it
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Paul Weale

customer_reviews.title: As you would expect from Apple. Fab product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a huge improvement on the iPad 2 which was slow when using the browser.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
